title: GenAI 101: What is RAG?
description:
Curious about RAG (retrieval augmented generation) and how to use it?

Join DataStax for a 45-minute deep dive livestream where we'll cover the fundamentals of RAG and show you how to integrate it into your next GenAI app. 

In this session, we will discuss:
--What RAG is and its benefits
--Basic code examples to get started with RAG
--Code snippets for utilizing RAG in a chatbot application

We'll be sure to wrap up with a live Q&A to answer your technical questions. Can't join live? Register anyway, and we'll send you the replay!

About DataStax Developer:
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache CassandraÂ©.  Visit https://datastax.com/dev for more free learning resources.
